databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT SI_EXPERIENCE_FOREIGN.MS_SENIN_ID , SI_EXPERIENCE_FOREIGN.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , SI_EXPERIENCE_FOREIGN.C5_FLAG , SI_EXPERIENCE_FOREIGN.COUNT ,
SI_EXPERIENCE_FOREIGN.DELETE_FLAG , SI_EXPERIENCE_FOREIGN.SEND_FLAG , SI_EXPERIENCE_FOREIGN.VESSEL_ID , SI_EXPERIENCE_FOREIGN.DATA_NO , SI_EXPERIENCE_FOREIGN.USER_KEY , SI_EXPERIENCE_FOREIGN.RENEW_DATE , SI_EXPERIENCE_FOREIGN.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_EXPERIENCE_FOREIGN.TS
FROM SI_EXPERIENCE_FOREIGN
WHERE SI_EXPERIENCE_FOREIGN.DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO SI_EXPERIENCE_FOREIGN( MS_SENIN_ID , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , C5_FLAG , COUNT ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_SENIN_ID , :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , :C5_FLAG , :COUNT ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_EXPERIENCE_FOREIGN SET COUNT = :COUNT ,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_SENIN_ID = :MS_SENIN_ID AND MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID = :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID AND C5_FLAG = :C5_FLAG
